content: Paul Rosolie is a naturalist, explorer, and author of the book "Junglekeeper," dedicated to protecting the Amazon rainforest.
To support the Lex Fridman podcast, check out its sponsors and use provided links for discounts.
The podcast episode features discussions on uncontacted tribes in the Amazon Jungle, intense new encounters, never-before-seen footage of tribe warriors, and the mysteries of the jungle.

The podcast episode covers topics such as the tribe's diet (monkeys, turtles, and turtle eggs), Jane Goodall, advice for young people, cartels, narco-traffickers, assassination attempts, climbing giant trees, giant anacondas, rescuing spider monkeys, dangerous animal encounters, writing, journaling, and great writer inspirations.
